channel.title: Moggrat.com | Blog
channel.description: The Blog of Luke The Moggrat. Talking about of my games, projects and the like.

item.title: New Blog, First Post & Updates
item.description: Hello readers. I'm Luke Scott a web and game developer from North West England, and this is my blog. The purpose of this blog is for me to talk about the ideas behind my games, updates and projects. Projects being tools, websites and just kinda anything. I also want to talk a bit about myself and my thoughts between and/or as part of other updates. I'm still unsure how often this blog will be updated.
